value.latex:
Soit $g : \R \to \R$ de classe $\mathcal{C}^2$ et
$f : {\R^*\times \R} \to \R, {(x,y)} \mapsto {g(y/x).}$
Trouver $g$ telle que $\frac{\partial^2 f}{\partial x^2} + \frac{\partial^2 f}{\partial y^2} = \frac y{x^3}$.
value.html: Soit \(g : \R \to \R\) de classe \(\mathcal{C}^2\) et \(f : {\R^*\times \R} \to \R, {(x,y)} \mapsto {g(y/x).}\) Trouver \(g\) telle que \(\frac{\partial^2 f}{\partial x^2} + \frac{\partial^2 f}{\partial y^2} = \frac y{x^3}\).
\(2tg'(t) + (1+t^2)g''(t) = t \Rightarrow g(t) = \frac t2 + \lambda\arctan t + \mu\).
